Title: Day 8: 10:00 A.M. - 11:00 A.M.
Plot: With only six hours left, the clock races toward the series finale as President Allison Taylor faces impossible choices and much to the dismay of CTU, she enlists a private security firm to complete a sensitive task led by Mark Bledsoe. Meanwhile, Jack calls in a favor to his old friend Rick Vickers before he embarks upon a crucial mission of his own.
GuestStars: Kiefer Sutherland, Annie Wersching, Mary Lynn Rajskub
